summary:
Major interest area: Breast cancer research

TECHNICAL SKILLS AND COMPETENCES:
Early phase study experience. Medical writing 
Knowldge of the dinamics of a medical staff; excellent ability in the decision making process; optimal capacity in the management of the phases of the oncologic disease (diagnosis, prognosis, therapy and follow-up); experience in the management of anti-cancer related toxicities. 
Excellent communications skills with patients (diagnosis communication, support in therapeutic process). Optimal collaboration skills in team work. Experience in overseeing palliative care team and, in cancer patients, management of distressing symptomps associated with life-threatening illness (control pain, nausea, diarrhoea); excellent ability in communications and support to the family during the patient's illness and in their bereavement.
headline: Oncologist
